Dublin Core:Title: Ada Downtown Design Plan - 1974
Dublin Core:Description: A study of the need for updating the Village core and to explore the potential for facilities improvements.
Dublin Core:Creator: James H. Bassett, Inc.
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Bellefontaine Urban Design Plan
Dublin Core:Description: This urban design plan centers on combining  a pleasant, unified pedestrian environment with a compatible system of vehicular circulation and parking.
Dublin Core:Creator: James H. Bassett, Inc.
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Stree Tree Program, Findlay, Ohio
Dublin Core:Description: This document is inteded as an implementation and management guide for Findlay's Street Tree Program. It provides background information as well as site inventory and analysis, provides recommended tree types, identifies typical problems and their possible solutions, suggests typical details, identifies priority planting projects and discusses the problems of implementation and maintenance.
Dublin Core:Creator: James H. Bassett, Inc. and Dale K. Manbeck
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Fostoria, Ohio Streetscape
Dublin Core:Description: As well as improve the physical appearance of the downtown, Fostoria's Streetscape will increase the comfort and safety of pedestrians by clarifying vehicular patterns such as parking and left turn lanes.
Dublin Core:Creator: James H. Bassett, Inc.
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Kenton, Ohio Downtown Revitalization Streetscape
Dublin Core:Description: This plan for the downtown area carefully blends functions of people traffic, and transit into a compatible refurbished environment.
Dublin Core:Creator: James H. Bassett, Inc.
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Downtown Streetscape Plan, Lancaster, Ohio: Lancaster Investing For Tomorrow
Dublin Core:Description: This streetscape plan carefully blends the requirements of people and traffic into a unified design that will enrich the urban core of Lancaster.
Dublin Core:Creator: Bassett Associates
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Downtown Mansfield Central Park District Streetscape Dedication
Dublin Core:Description: The concept of Streetscape is an effort to produce an environment that will reduce the impace of vehicular traffic and increase visual amenities, as well as pedestrian comfort and safety.
Dublin Core:Creator: James H. Bassett, Inc.
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Ottawa River Corridor, Lima, Ohio Masterplan
Dublin Core:Description: Continued restoration of the Ottawa River Corridor, including the extension of a multi-use trail system through the urban section of the river, will provide an important green space link tying together existing parks and open spaces.
Dublin Core:Creator: Bassett Associates
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Spencerville, Ohio Streetscape
Dublin Core:Description: In an effort to capture the history and to guarantee a vital business center for present and future years, a Downtown Streetscape Project is being undertaken.
Dublin Core:Creator: James H. Bassett, Inc.
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: City of Springboro, Ohio Community Development Guide Plan 1990
Dublin Core:Description: The Springboro Community Development Guide Plan is intended to direct the pattern of development of the Springboro area.
Dublin Core:Creator: Bassett Associates
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Streetscape Sylvania, Ohio
Dublin Core:Description: The streetscape design will incorporate new sidewalks and curbs including plaza-like areas of decorative paving.
Dublin Core:Creator: James H. Bassett, Inc.
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Tiffin, Ohio Downtown Revitalization
Dublin Core:Description: To bring about a unique and economically viable atmosphere this report suggests four basic programs: streetscape improvements, parking, facade renovation, and rehabilitation of existing structures for new development.
Dublin Core:Creator: James H. Bassett, Inc.
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license
